message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this price reflects the value it will bring to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you coming down from your initial price. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. This is a fair price that reflects the value I see in it.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  However, I can't go lower than $12,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
